Module jGame
Package jGame.core.utils.properties

Class PropertiesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.core.utils.properties.PropertiesManager
  • public class PropertiesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for collecting important properties from a file in the file system to be used.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nuno Pereira

      Loads all the properties from the input stream and makes them available for use.

        Loads all the properties from the input stream and makes them available for use.

      • fetchProperties

        public static void fetchProperties​(java.io.File propertiesFile)
        Loads all the properties from the file and makes them available for use.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - the properties file to read properties from.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • fetchProperties

        public static void fetchProperties​(java.lang.String propertiesFilePath)
        Loads all the properties from the file pointed by propertiesFilePath and makes them available for use.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFilePath - the path of the properties file to read properties from.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getProperty

        public static java.lang.String getProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName)
        Returns the value of the property identified by propertyName.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the name/key of the desired property
        Returns:
        the value for the property with key propertyName
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getPropertyOrDefault

        public static java.lang.String getPropertyOrDefault​(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                    java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Returns the value of the property identified by propertyName. If no such property exists, defaultValue is returned.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the name/key of the desired property
        defaultValue - a default value to be returned if there is no property with key propertyName
        Returns:
        the value for the property with key propertyName, or defaultValue, if no property with key propertyName exists.
        Since:
        1.0.0
